item.description: When Circle Internet Group Inc. went public this summer, it marked a milestone: stablecoins — once a niche crypto utility — were stepping into the financial mainstream and USDC, its dollar

item.title: Circle Falls After Company, Holders Offer 10 Million Shares
item.description: Shares of Circle Internet Group Inc. fell after the second-largest stablecoin issuer and a group of shareholders including co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Jeremy Allaire announced an offering t

item.title: Circle Posts Second-Quarter Loss, Sees Revenue Increase 53%
item.description: Just two months after one one of the splashiest public debuts in years, stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group Inc. said that it had a second-quarter loss and revenue rose more than estimated.

item.title: Circle Posts Second-Quarter Loss, Sees Revenue Increase 53%
item.description: Just two months after one one of the splashiest public debuts in years, stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group Inc. said that it had a second-quarter loss and revenue rose more than estimated.
